00025 #ifndef _BASE_QUAT4_
00026 #define _BASE_QUAT4_

00028 #include <iostream>

00030 #include <base/base>

00039 namespace base {
00040 
00041 class Quat4;
00042 inline Quat4 inverse(const Quat4& q); //foward
00043 
00044 
00045 //
00046 // The quaternion
00047 //
00048 
00049 class Quat4
00050 {
00051 
00052 public:
00053   Quat4() { setIdentity(); }
00054   Quat4(const Quat4& q) { this->operator=(q); }
00055   Quat4(const Vector3& v) : v(v), w(Real(1)) {}
00056   Quat4(const Vector4& v) : v(v.x,v.y,v.z), w(v.w) {}
00057   explicit Quat4(const Real& s) : v(Real(0),Real(0),Real(0)), w(s) {}
00058   Quat4(Real x, Real y, Real z, Real w) : v(x,y,z), w(w) {}
00059   Quat4(const Vector3& axis, Real angle) { setRotation(axis,angle); }
00060   ~Quat4() {}
00061 
00062   static const Int X = 1;
00063   static const Int Y = 2;
00064   static const Int Z = 3;
00065   static const Int W = 4;
00066 
00067   void setIdentity() throw()
00068   {
00069     v.x=v.y=v.z=Real(0); w=Real(1);
00070   }
00071 
00072   void setZero() throw()
00073   {
00074     setIdentity(); w=Real(0);
00075   }
00076 
00077 
00078   Real& e(Int i) throw()
00079   {
00080 #ifdef DEBUG
00081     if ((i < 1) || (i > 4))
00082       throw std::runtime_error(Exception("quaternion index out of bounds (debug only check)"));
00083 #endif 
00084     return (i<4)?v.e(i):w; 
00085   }
00086 
00087   const Real& e(Int i) const throw()
00088   {
00089 #ifdef DEBUG
00090     if ((i < 1) || (i > 4))
00091       throw std::runtime_error(Exception("quaternion index out of bounds (debug only check)"));
00092 #endif 
00093     return (i<4)?v.e(i):w; 
00094   }
00095 
00096   Real& at(Int i) throw(std::out_of_range)
00097   {
00098     if ((i < 1) || (i > 4))
00099       throw std::out_of_range(Exception("quaternion index out of bounds"));
00100 
00101     return (i<4)?v.e(i):w;
00102   }
00103 
00104   const Real& at(Int i) const throw(std::out_of_range)
00105   {
00106     if ((i < 1) || (i > 4))
00107       throw std::out_of_range(Exception("quaternion index out of bounds"));
00108 
00109     return (i<3)?v.e(i):w;
00110   }
00111 
00112   Real& operator[](Int i)  
00113   { return e(i); }
00114 
00115   const Real& operator[](Int i) const
00116   { return e(i); }
00117 
00118   Quat4& operator=(const Quat4& src) throw()
00119   {
00120     if (&src != this) {
00121       v=src.v; w=src.w;
00122     }
00123     return *this;
00124   }
00125 
00126   bool operator==(const Quat4& q) const throw()
00127   {
00128     if (&q == this) return true;
00129     
00130     return ((v==q.v)&&(w==q.w));
00131   }
00132 
00133   bool equals(const Quat4& q) const throw()
00134   {
00135     if (&q == this) return true;
00136 
00137     return (v.equals(q.v) && (base::equals(w,q.w)));
00138   }
00139 
00140   Real norm() const throw()
00141   { return v.x*v.x+v.y*v.y+v.z*v.z+w*w; }
00142 
00143   Quat4& normalize() throw()
00144     {
00145       Real n = norm();
00146       
00147       if (n>0) {
00148         Real l = base::sqrt(n);
00149         v /= l;
00150         w /= l;
00151       }
00152       return *this;
00153     }
00154 
00155   Quat4& conjugate() { v.negate(); return *this; }
00156 
00157   Quat4& invert() throw()    // doesn't check /0 for speed
00158   {
00159     Real n = norm(); 
00160     conjugate(); 
00161     *this /= n;  
00162     return *this;
00163   }
00164 
00165   Quat4& operator*=(const Quat4& qr);
00166   Quat4& operator*=(Real s) { v*=s; w*=s; return *this; }
00167   Quat4& operator/=(Real s) { v/=s; w/=s; return *this; }
00168   Quat4& operator+=(const Quat4& q) { v+=q.v; w+=q.w; return *this; }
00169   Quat4& operator-=(const Quat4& q) { v-=q.v; w-=q.w; return *this; }
00170 
00171   Quat4& negate() throw() { v.negate(); w=-w; return *this; }
00172 
00176   void setRotation(const Matrix4& rotation);
00177 
00178   void setRotation(const Vector3& axis, Real angle);
00179   void getRotation(Vector3& axis, Real& angle) const; 
00180   void rotatePoint(Point4& p) const;
00181   void rotatePoint(Point3& p) const 
00182     { Point4 p4(p); p4.w=0; rotatePoint(p4); p=Point3(p4.x,p4.y,p4.z); }
00183   Point3 rotate(const Point3& p) const 
00184     { Point4 ret(p); rotatePoint(ret); return Point3(ret.x,ret.y,ret.z); }
00185   Point4 rotate(const Point4& p) const
00186     { Point4 ret(p); rotatePoint(ret); return ret; }
00187 
00188   operator Matrix4() const;   
00189 
00190   Real* c_array() { return &v.x; }
00191 
00192 
00193   Vector3 v;
00194   Real w;
00195 
00196   friend std::ostream& operator<<(std::ostream&, const Quat4&); 
00197 
00198 };
00199

00201 // Operationsg
00202 
00203 
00204 inline Quat4 operator*(const Quat4& q1, const Quat4& q2) // Quaternion multiplication
00205 { Quat4 r(q1); return (r *= q2); }
00206 
00207 inline Quat4 operator+(const Quat4& q1, const Quat4& q2) // Addition
00208 { Quat4 r(q1); return (r += q2); }
00209 
00210 inline Quat4 operator-(const Quat4& q1, const Quat4& q2) // Subtraction
00211 { Quat4 r(q1); return (r += q2); }
00212 
00213 inline Quat4 operator-(const Quat4& q1) // Negation
00214 { Quat4 r(q1); return r.negate(); }
00215 
00216 inline Quat4 operator*(const Quat4& q1, const Real& s) // Scalar multiplication
00217 { Quat4 r(q1); return (r *= s); }
00218 
00219 inline Quat4 operator*(const Real& s, const Quat4& q1) // Scalar multiplication
00220 { Quat4 r(q1); return (r *= s); }
00221 
00222 inline Quat4 operator/(const Quat4& q1, const Real& s) // Scalar division
00223 { Quat4 r(q1); return (r /= s); }
00224 
00225 inline Quat4 inverse(const Quat4& q) // inverse q^-1
00226 { Quat4 r(q); return r.invert(); }
00227 
00228 inline Quat4 conjugate(const Quat4& q)  // conjugate q*
00229 { Quat4 r(q); return r.conjugate(); }

00232 std::ostream& operator<<(std::ostream& out, const Quat4& q); // Output
